title: Drawing, Design for Oblong Sideboard with Eight Legs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Oblong Sideboard with Eight Legs
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: 26591 [and illeg. inscription]; below that: [inverted "V"] l+VX; above image at center, with pointing arrow: Inlay; above center, across left edge, and lower left of image, numerical notations
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong sideboard with eight straight tapering legs decorated with floral garlands; rounded corners have patera medallions center; molded tri-partite front has slightly indented central section with two doors topped by large drawer flanked by narrow side doors, each with a small drawer atop; low backsplash has horizontal patera medallion center.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Oblong Sideboard with Eight Legs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-37.
